views.markdown:
Enable native PiP in YouTube app.

If you encounter playback speedup issue for your PiP, try to upgrade to YouPiP 1.4.1+ or use iOS 15.0b2+.

If you encounter "No stream Tap to Retry" error for your video, you are recommended to upgrade YouTube to the latest version.

- Refactored logic around PiP activation via button tap
- Reworked settings page
- (15.22.4+)
- YouPiP no longer dismisses the app automatically when PiP is activated from the button because the legacy app assertion leads to PiP closing itself (15.22.4+)
- Fixed crashing on YouTube version 15.49.6 (and maybe lower) (15.22.4+)
- Fixed crashing on iOS 14.0-14.1 for YouTube version 16.25.2 (15.22.4+)
- Force-enabled YouTube's enablePipForNonBackgroundableContent flag that may fix PiP crashing issue for some people (15.22.4+)
- Added Sample Buffer Hack in settings (iOS 14) (15.22.4+)

- Fixed app crashing on some versions of iOS 14
- Added a warning alert if YouTube version is lower than 15.22.4
- (15.22.4+)
- Fixed PiP not working on iOS 14.0 - 14.4 for YouTube 16.25.2 (15.22.4+)
- Added few more missing logic from iOS 15.0b2 approach (15.22.4+)
- Attempted to fix PiP playback speedup bug using iOS 15.0b2 approach (15.22.4+)
- Enable native PiP toggle inside YouTube settings (15.22.4+)
- Refactored logic related to bootstraping PiP functionality (15.22.4+)
- Fixed crash due to adding PiP button to the overlay for some users (15.22.4+)
- Fixed crash on YouTube version 15.49.6 (15.22.4+)
- Added legacy PiP implementation in settings, made for iOS 14+ (15.22.4+)
- Removed armv7 slice as YouTube targets iOS 11 and above (15.22.4+)
- Added backward compatibility with YouTube 15.22.4 (15.22.4+)
- "On PiP button tap" should no longer make PiP activated on app dismiss (iOS 14+) (16.17.4)
- Added settings page to choose how to activate PiP (16.17.4)

- Made PiP activated the first time the app is dismissed (iOS 14+)
- Made PiP activated only when the app is dismissed (iOS 13-)
- (16.17.4)
- Implemented PiP backward-compatible with iOS 13- (16.17.4)
- Fixed crashing when casting a video (16.17.4)
- Activate PiP simply by playing the video and dismissing the app (thanks @lgariv) (16.17.4)
- Support YouTube version 16.17.4 (16.17.4)
- Experimental support for YouTube version 15.47.3 (15.47.3 - 16.16.4)
